name: Gbike
body:
### Welcome to gBike Pages.
This project is an android application based on my [bleController project](https://github.com/marduino/bleController). You can find the project [here](https://github.com/marduino/gBike)
Here is a video for your reference: http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTMxODk2NTgwNA==.html

### Software architecture
This software can be used to communicate with remote bleController, based on my private high security protocal. This android part software contains Android part and JNI part, JNI part implements the communication protocal. Android part implemented the bluetooth device managments and UI interface.

### Creating projects quickly
If you prefer to the project you may use android-elipse to quick build and run it to have a brief short look.

### Authors and Contributors
This project is created by @liudancodeman and then re-constructed by My Yunfei, it is now also maintained by Ma Yunfei shmayunfei@qq.com

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with gBike? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/marduino/gBike/wiki) or contact me shmayunfei@qq.com, and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
You are also very welcome to join our qq group 79272912
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
